name: Zbang
overview:
Zbang integrates all your online activity into a single place, allowing you to seemingly work across different platforms, without having to flip from one site to the other.

Zbang is now releasing the newest version of it’s unified messaging program called MultiMi, which connects all of your social media networks and email accounts into one easy-to-use free program. Through MultiMi you can connect your accounts and networks, and are good to go - leaving multiple logins and switching between browser tabs behind. The unified dashboard also makes it simple to share content, pictures, and videos with your online connections, simply by dragging and dropping. Integrated security, from AVG, keeps you safe from malicious links by scanning messages with AVG’s LinkScanner technology.

milestones.description: AVG Takes 20% Stake In Zbang, Makers Of The Ultimate Social Inbox
milestones.source_description: AVG Takes 20% Stake In Zbang, Makers Of The Ultimate Social Inbox
